NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PHLOX: Papa, my mini shuttle went missing again.. 2 1 PLUME: Did you leave it on the quantum shard again, Phlox? What did I teach you about leaving your toys on a quantum entity? 3 2 PHLOX: Um.. Objects left on quantum things travel with them.. Right? 4 3 PLUME: Indeed! So be sure to keep your toys neatly, away from any quantum objects, alright, Phlox? 5 3 PLUME: Now, let us locate the quantum shard and retrieve your toy, so we may rest for the day. 6 5 PHLOX: Okay, papa!
